page_content:
GRP XS ELS - Edit Graph details

Version:MissionOS_2.0

How to edit a specific GRP_XS_ELS Group Graph detail:

 

Go to Data Manager > Instrumentation > Setup > Display Groups.

Select Instrument Type (DisplayGroup), Group Class (GRP_GRAPH), Group Type (GRP_XS_ELS) and then select the required Group Graph to edit/delete from the Existing Groups dropdown list.

 

 

 

 

 

Note: To delete a specific Group, click the Delete button.

To edit, click the Edit. Refer to the figure below, to view how to edit:

 

 

 

You will be auto-navigated to the Members section after clicking on Edit button – Here you can do modifications as required.

Add or remove instruments, select or unselect checkboxes of struts. Then click Save.

 

 

 

You will be auto-navigated to the Finish section. Verify the entered details once again.

Finally click Update to update the group graph.

Go back to the Portal Homepage interface and click Refresh.

Now you can access the updated version of the GRP_XS_ELS Group Graph.
